subject: Polls and Public Opinion
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the latest New York Times/NY1/Siena College poll of New York City, more than three-quarters of Yankees fans agreed that this year should be Derek Jeter’s last.
snippet: In the latest New York Times/NY1/Siena College poll of New York City, more than three-quarters of Yankees fans agreed that this year should be Derek Jeter’s last.
